website_summaries.verdict: With larger teeth, these spoons scoop out grapefruit in a cinch. But be sure to eat carefully.
pros: Set of 4 stainless steel grapefruit spoons
Serrated edges easily loosen grapefruit sections
Also good with oranges and kiwi, and for digging baked potatoes out of the skin
Larger teeth make these easier to use than serrated spoon designs
cons: Larger teeth make it easier to cut your mouth if you're not careful

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for the price! I read review after review on here, and I'm so glad I went with this spoon. They are a nice weight without being too heavy. They will not bend. The size of the scoop part is perfect - it's not too wide (a problem a friend had with a different grapefruit spoon purchased on here). They cut the grapefruit nicely without cutting my lips. My friend is returning hers and buying these instead! My only complaint is that I'd have prefered to pay half as much for only 2 spoons. I don't really need 4. But you can't beat ten bucks!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several Grapefruit Spoons and decided to give these a try. I only use them to eat grapefruits. Pleasantly surprised that they worked so well as they were not among the more costly ones I considered. I had lost all but one of my previous spoons. Where do they go! Actually, happier with these as the previous spoons could be uncomfortable on the lips and tongue if not careful. Think I will loose that last previous spoon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excise grapefruit segments easily and effectively
customer_reviews.text: As a long time lover of grapefruit, having lost all but one of my very good grapefruit spoons over the years, I find these spoons are great and do a very good job of excising grapefruit segments. I thought my old grapefruit spoons were very special and great but these might be a tad greater.
customer_reviews.author: NW

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit Spoon Review for September 2014
customer_reviews.text: Received the four spoons in good order. Quality of the manufacturer is good (Norpro). Some have complained that spoons are too sharp and cause abrasions, others complain they are too dull for cutting. In my experience they are about right and the metal gage is heavy enough in quality. Price is great. We have paid a lot more for these types of utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Radio Man

customer_reviews.title: Possibly average
customer_reviews.text: I lost my grapefruit spoons in the divorce. They worked great at cutting individual bites out of the membrane. These tear down the membrane instead of cutting the fruit out. Three stars seems generous, but my old grapefruit spoons were so old that this might be the new standard. Fortunately, I bought a grapefruit knife at the same time. I'll try that next. Same brand, so fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Rose

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! I eat grits with fried eggs on top for breakfast sometimes and these work perfect.... like a spork. It cuts my eggs and lets me scoop my grits. Cantaloupe with cottage also, I can get all of the fruit with out hurting my hand pushing a spoon. Will buy again. They shipped quick and work perfect, dish washer safe and stylist for you table.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: They may not be the most durable but these are perfect for their use and price. The most affordable pack I found and I was impressed with the quality for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Klein

customer_reviews.title: Every guest thinks that these are expensive brand-named spoons
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read other users' reviews before purchase. These grapefruit spoons are exactly what I was looking for! Its weight on my hand feels like heavy-duty and durably constructed, and with a beautiful polish/gloss. The serrated teeth are not overly sharp, yet doing the job very well for clean cutting grapefruit. I was very surprised by its quality, and every guest I served with these spoons thinks that these are expensive brand-named spoons!
customer_reviews.author: D. C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: Awesome grapefruit spoons. Very substantial and a nice weight - not "tinny" at all. These grapefruit spoons pop your sectioned grapefruit out super easy. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki M.

customer_reviews.title: I've been searching for Grapefruit Spoons like this for years.
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of their weight in my hand; I know they're not a cheesy piece of stamped stainless. The serrated edge makes short work of the grapefruit segments, without making it look as it a Cuisinart got to it first. They were also well priced.
customer_reviews.author: BigBirdley

customer_reviews.title: Good basic stainless grapefruit spoons
customer_reviews.text: Good basic stainless steel grapefruit spoons. I've had these for a few years and the finish still looks great. Just ordered more for someone who liked mine. :)
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these little guys. Well made and work great. I see one or two souls have complained about the sharpness of the serrated edges. I've never felt threatened by these spoons. Just sharp enough to dig out grapefruit flesh.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Luggs

customer_reviews.title: Teeth are not big or sharp enough
customer_reviews.text: These are okay, but they're not sharp enough to do the job properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M. Fiore

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect.Solid product. Will not easily bend, will not rust or tarnish. Just enough serration to cut the grapefruit and not be a hindrance to eating it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J Shecter

customer_reviews.title: These spoons work very well and are just the right ...
customer_reviews.text: These spoons work very well and are just the right sharpness and weight. I honestly have no idea why anyone would rate them less than 5 stars. It's a spoon, really
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth to own if you like eating grapefruits
customer_reviews.text: Love eating grapefruit? Well, this really makes it easier than using the knife first and then the spoon. I enjoy using it.

customer_reviews.title: Nice

customer_reviews.title: A happy user.
customer_reviews.text: I had to cut the little segments of grapefruit before I got these spoons. Now I don't. A happy user.

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great spoons. Been using them for several months now. They're sturdy, comfortable, haven't stained, and they cut the grapefruit well. Would definitely order again.

customer_reviews.title: I like them.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find these in stores. They are nice and heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. The triangle shape is a little different than what I'm used to and I don't think it works as well as a rounded front. I miss my old spoons that disappeared. This replacement worked, but not as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Tech

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: This grapefruit spoon is not serrated enough to cut into a grapefruit. I still have to cut out the sections with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: RuthB

customer_reviews.title: Stop squinting every time you stick a spoon into your grapefruit!
customer_reviews.text: Trying to eat grapefruit with a dull spoon is like trying to eat an angry spitting cobra. If you buy these grapefruit spoons, you will be properly armed (to eat grapefuit, probably not spitting cobras). Pros: 1. Inexpensive. 2. Effective. They cut nicely into the grapefruit, and don't abrade your lips/tongue/etc. Honestly if you're reviewing this product and saying the serrated edges hurt your mouth, I feel like you're using spoons wrong. 3. They may not look like they belong amongst your fancy china and silver, but they don't look cheap, either. 4. Norpro. Brand recognition! Cons: none. Buy them if you need grapefruit spoons.
customer_reviews.author: GrumpGrump

customer_reviews.title: Norpro 1280 Stainless Steel Deluxe Grapefruit Spoons
customer_reviews.text: My 92-year-old aunt has just one grapefruit spoon that she frequently uses to separate the grapefruit sections. By the way — her spoon has only one serrated side. She eats half a grapefruit every day. When I showed (and demonstrated) my brand new, shiny, sterling, two-sided serrated spoon — guess what she's been using ever since?
customer_reviews.author: fastrecipes-20

customer_reviews.title: Norpro 1280 Stainless Steel Grapefruit Spoons
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some substantial grapefruit spoons to keep in our motor home so I wasn't dragging the ones from the house in and out. These spoons sounded like good ones to me from the reviews others had given them. Even though they may be slightly more expensive than others at Amazon I am very pleased with them. They are a heavier stainless steel and won't bend when you dig into the grapefruit. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Luce

customer_reviews.title: They work well, but need a slight adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: If I could make one change, it'd be that the cutting edge not be angled such that I have to be extra careful when I put the spoon in my mouth. The tines are curved inward, ever so slightly, and catch on the inside of my upper incisors. MANY moons later, I've opted to edit my review. I don't take anything back, but want to relay that I've discovered so many wonderful uses for these grapefruit spoons! They're perfect for seeding cantaloupe and honeydew, and are great for scraping/scooping a little ice cream out of a tub. Wonderful tool to de-seed an avocado, too. 4.5 stars (if i could)!
customer_reviews.author: Nytyngale

customer_reviews.title: Good spoons!
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered on time and in good condition. The teeth on the sppons bit easily into the grapefruit i waseating and cleaningcut out the sections in the grapefruit. I did not have an issue with the teeth cutting into my mouth. The spoons fit well in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Strong. No worries about bending. Dig out of prison with these.
customer_reviews.text: Remember when stuff was worth buying? These spoons remind me of that. Solid, strong enough to root around without bending. Still pricey, but that's what you have to pay for spoons that aren't weak. Nice sharp teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Lindo (or her hubby)

customer_reviews.title: Have Your Spoon and Grapefruit Too!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice indeed! Sturdy. Nice design. Good serrated edge. Works! It is hard to wax poetic about grapefruit spoons. Glad Amazon offered them. Hard to locate on a local basis. Not even the super markets sell them. Prefer the grapefruit spoon over the grapefruit knife. The spoon is far more convenient from my perspective and a time saver. A worthwhile investment for the kitchen and for grapefruit eaters.
customer_reviews.author: SMRF

customer_reviews.title: Good for grapefruits and kiwi
customer_reviews.text: I've had them for two years now. They're sturdy and useful, I use them mainly for eating grapefruit and kiwi. The price was good and the quality is fine, even though they're not the sharpest. Not being very sharp actually has an advantage as there's less chance of injury.
customer_reviews.author: danna

customer_reviews.title: The best one I ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best one I ever used. Only squirted once. These are substantial, not so thin they bend, strong enough with a comfortable handle that does not feel sharp in my hand. Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Eclipser

customer_reviews.title: No need to pre-cut! Iove these spoons!!
customer_reviews.text: I love grapefruit so much but don't eat them because, like for many people, they often feel like too much of a hassle. Not anymore! These spoons are great! They don't cut your mouth or anything but are sharp enough to cut the grapefruit to make eating grapefruit a breeze! You no longer need a knife!! (Except to cut the grapefruit in half of course).
customer_reviews.author: Monica R.

customer_reviews.title: FABULOUS GRAPEFRUIT SPOON !
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous grapefruit spoon. I have had a few in my 74 years ,but this one beats them all. It is exactly as it is shown. I love it.

customer_reviews.title: These are the nicest quality grapefruit spoons that I have found.
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest quality grapefruit spoons that I have found. They are of the same quality as my everyday flatware, very sturdy and do not bend. The triangular shape works great to remove the fruit! I would highly recommend these spoons. The price was very reasonable.

They are well made and will last a long time! My husband actually ordered these for me for a Christmas gift and I am thrilled with them!!

product_meta.title: Norpro Stainless Steel Deluxe Grapefruit Spoons, Set of 4, Metallic
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Style Name:MetallicMeasures: 6.25" X 1" X .75"/ 16cm x 2.5cm x 2cmset of 4dig into that juicy grapefruit with the proper utensil! This beautiful modern serrated grapefruit spoon makes sure you get every bit of that delicious fruit. Polished stainless steel spoons with serrated edges easily loosen grapefruit sections. Also suitable for use with oranges and Kiwi fruit. Great for destemming strawberries too!norpro was founded in 1973 with a vision to design, manufacture, and supply the highest caliber kitchenware. Norpro’s offering of innovative, high quality Product for cooking, preparing and serving food are produced with superior materials and craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: Measures: 6.25" x 1" x .75" / 16cm x 2.5cm x 2cm / Set of 4
Dig into that juicy grapefruit with the proper utensil!
This beautiful modern serrated grapefruit spoon makes sure you get every bit of that delicious fruit.
Polished stainless steel spoons with serrated edges easily loosen grapefruit sections.
Also suitable for use with oranges, kiwi fruit and destemming strwaberries!
